Text:
Thanks for sharing the Mac stuff....!

Merry Christmas DJMac
Just the app (its not cracked). Only gives you 10 changes. Needs serial. Couldn't find one.
Anyone have a serial for this? Its useless without.
You can find plenty more Leopard Docks at http://www.leoparddocks.com

install dev tools....then the userfolder/Library/Prefs/com.whimsplucky.dockchanger.plist can be edited by Property List editor.

Change the changecount line to 0 and you're back to 0! 

:)
